title: Provided that no cluster or clusters shall be identified for redevelopment or implementation of Urban Renewal Scheme by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority without carrying out an Impact Assessment Study regarding the impact on the city and sector level infrastructure and amenities as well as traffic and environment of the implementation of URS on such cluster or clusters
clause_text: Provided that no cluster or clusters shall be identified for redevelopment or implementation of Urban Renewal Scheme by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority without carrying out an Impact Assessment Study regarding the impact on the city and sector level infrastructure and amenities as well as traffic and environment of the implementation of URS on such cluster or clusters.
section: 33(9) (B): Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster of BDD chawls at Naigaon, Worli, N.M.Joshi Marg and Shivdi under Urban Renewal Scheme(s).

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that no cluster or clusters shall be identified for redevelopment or implementation of Urban Renewal Scheme by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority without carrying out an Impact A
